latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - No inspection conducted

violations.Violation Summary: At the time child care service was providing care it has been determined that the child care service failed to limit areas used by children to their exclusive use Unauthorized children and/or adults allowed to inhabit child care service facilities during child care hours
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed in the child care service that a bathroom/closet or other enclosed space has a locking mechanism solely operable from inside the space
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection lavatory facilities failed to be provided with child high/accessible toilets and sinks
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
